name: ZETA WAVE INFINITY
description:
Enjoy in this adrenalinic arcade game with the beatiful AI pilots named

ZETA and OMEGA

In this demo you can play only with Zeta and you can choice Normal Mode Only.

In this demo game you can destroy three enemy type and only one enemy dangerous, but it's no easy!

For the controls and other information you can read the file README.

you can play with controller XBOX360 compatible (the game is tested with nocom)

select it in the option in main menu game.

I hope like my game and hope with your help and feedback continue this project

a special thanks to JIYU for his awesome artworks!

https://twitter.com/jiyu57

you can follow me on twitter or istagram

ZETA GET READY!!!

LET'S ROCK BABY !!!
